description: Uva Province - Repealed the Notice published in Gaz. Ex. Ord. No. 1793/6 of 16.01.2013; and Re-established the Welimada P/S with effect from 16.06.2014; and Replealed the appointment of Mr. Ratnayake Mudiyanselage Jayawardene, Asst. Commissioner of L/G in Badulla District in order to execute the powers and carryout the task of Weliada P/S made through Gaz. Ex. Ord. No. 1822/21 of 07.08.2013
